author: psmith
msg: had refactored out the Column name definitions into a separate class.
Also allowed a different CyclicBuffer table model to be use if a System
property is set.  This is only an interim setup, as the CyclicBufferTableModel
is not fully tested, and so if the property is not defined, and set to "true"
Eventually there will be a GUI option to allow the choice of a bounded

author: psmith
msg: Initial Cyclic Implementation of the TableModel interface.
events that get added will be added to the end, with the ones at the front
Currently the ID of all the Events inserted at the end of the CyclicBuffer
after it reaches it's size receive the id "size()+1".
There is currently no support for resize at this point in time.
